fields.title: Home Alone
fields.description: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his home from a pair of bungling burglars when his family leaves him home alone for Christmas.
fields.starring: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, Catherine O'Hara

fields.title: Elf
fields.description: A human raised as an elf at the North Pole travels to New York City to find his biological father.
fields.starring: Will Ferrell, Zooey Deschanel, James Caan

fields.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
fields.description: The Muppets retell Charles Dickens' classic tale of a miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.
fields.starring: Michael Caine, Kermit the Frog, Miss Piggy

fields.title: Love Actually
fields.description: Follows the lives of eight very different couples dealing with love during the Christmas season.
fields.starring: Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Colin Firth, Keira Knightley

fields.title: Die Hard
fields.description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage during a Christmas party.
fields.writer: Jeb Stuart, Steven E. de Souza

fields.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
fields.description: Jack Skellington discovers Christmas Town and tries to bring Christmas under his control.
fields.starring: Danny Elfman, Chris Sarandon, Catherine O'Hara

fields.title: A Christmas Story
fields.description: In the 1940s, a young boy dreams of getting a Red Ryder BB gun for Christmas.

fields.title: Klaus
fields.description: A simple act of kindness sparks an endless chain of goodwill in a snowy town.

fields.title: Gremlins
fields.description: A young man receives a strange creature as a pet, which spawns other creatures that transform into monsters.

fields.title: It's a Wonderful Life
fields.description: An angel helps a compassionate but despairingly frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like without him.
